messages.title: A personal message from Will Sweet
messages.content:
Dear Resident,

A General Election has been called and I am standing to be your Member of Parliament. I want to champion Putney, Southfields and Roehampton to give opportunity to everyone.

Wandsworth is my home. This is where I grew up, went to school and got my first job. I have a track record of delivery here as a Wandsworth Councillor and I’d use my experience working for the Foreign Office to help you.

I’d like to meet as many of you as possible to try to win your support. Please don’t hesitate to contact me and I will do my best to help you.

leaflet.personalStatement:
